title: Where can I buy the cheapest Apple products in the Philippines? - Quora
tags: Advice About Apple Products and Services

response.answer_text: The Philippines is not a great place to buy technology… pretty much everything I’ve seen there is about the same price here in Australia. There’s plenty of Chinese knock-off fakes in the dodgy shops in some of the malls, but if you want real Apple stuff you‘ll have to go to an Apple shop and pay retail.
